plot: A young wannabe cowboy is visited by his newly-pregnant sister and her Mexican boyfriend, whom he challenges to a swim in the Arroyo Seco river.
title: Arroyo Seco
plot_es: A young wannabe cowboy is visited by his newly-pregnant sister and her Mexican boyfriend, whom he challenges to a swim in the Arroyo Seco river.
plot_en: A young wannabe cowboy is visited by his newly-pregnant sister and her Mexican boyfriend, whom he challenges to a swim in the Arroyo Seco river.
